events.blurb: Armand Malfoy serves William the Conqueror
events.description:
Armand Malfoy arrives in England with the invading Norman force.
In exchange for unknown, but almost certainly magical and probably
shady services, he is granted a "prime" area of land in Wiltshire.
events.source:
Mrs. J. K. Rowling.
"[The Malfoy Family](https://www.rowlingindex.org/work/pmmf/)"
_[The J.K. Rowling Index](https://www.rowlingindex.org/)_
Originally Published: 2012-07-10.
